aphrosisms.text: Life is the only game in which the object of the game is to learn the rules.
The world is divided into two categories: failures and unknowns.
No paradise is complete without a serpent.
The splinter in your eye is the best magnifying glass.
To succeed, one must question the value of one's works, but never the value of one's work.
Enthusiasm is always right, even in the wrong place.
